body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Brian Wood and the customer's name is Alexis Diaz.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out. My name is Brian Wood, and I represent Premium Accounting Solutions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated about my latest bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Let's see what we can do to help resolve your concerns. Could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it is two one three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's September twenty first, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information, Alexis. Let me pull up your account details.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate it. I just want to understand why my bill is higher than last month.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I will look into that for you right now. Thank you for your patience!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, I've found the information. It looks like there were some additional services added this month.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, I see! Thank you for clarifying.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem! Thank you for your time, Alexis. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
